scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:landing"
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:frontend" "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:landing"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd Frontend && npm install && cd ../Backend && npm install && cd ../Landing && npm install
scripts.build:all: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend && npm run build:landing
